channel.title: CVE Feed for Grup Arge Energy and Control Systems -- Smartpower
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Grup Arge Energy and Control Systems -- Smartpower

item.title: CVE-2024-0851|2024-08-01T18:18:18.909Z -- grup%20arge%20energy%20and%20control%20systems -- smartpower
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Grup Arge Energy and Control Systems Smartpower allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Smartpower: through V24.05.27.

item.title: CVE-2024-0851|2024-06-04T17:58:30.549Z -- grup%20arge%20energy%20and%20control%20systems -- smartpower
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Grup Arge Energy and Control Systems Smartpower allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Smartpower: through V24.05.27.
